p: The multi-day extreme precipitation and discharge indices, widely used in extreme events analyses [ 38], were selected to reflect extreme precipitation and flow in this study ( Table 3). One type of index measures the annual maximum amount of daily precipitation, such as AMX1p, AMX3p and AMX7p. Another type of index measures the maximum discharge in successive n days, such as AMX1d, AMX3d and AMX7d.
